Class CaesarCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • CaesarCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher

    public class CaesarCipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cipher
    Caesar cipher implementation for encrypting and decrypting.
    Author:
    Glavin Wiechert

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • ALPHABET_SIZE

        static final int ALPHABET_SIZE
        The length of the alphabet used in the Caesar Cipher. English has 26 letters, so this value is fixed to 26.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • charOffset

        private int charOffset
        The character offset in the Caesar Cipher calculations. Defaults to 3.
